data.name: AppTitle
data.comment: @Invariant

data.name: LoginTitle
data.comment: Title of the login view

data.name: EmailAddress
data.comment: Used as a placeholder for the email field in the login and signup view

data.name: Password
data.comment: Used as a placeholder for the password field in the login and sign up view

data.name: GoogleLogin
data.comment: Text of the button that allows to enter your account using Google

data.name: GoogleSignUp
data.comment: Text of the button that allows to create your account using Google

data.name: Or
data.comment: Used in the login and signup views as a way to show there are other login/signup options

data.name: DoNotHaveAnAccountWithQuestionMark
data.comment: Used in the login view as a call to action to the sign up view

data.name: SignUpTitle
data.comment: Title of the sign up view

data.name: LoginForgotPassword
data.comment: Link to the password reset view

data.name: LoginGetHelpLoggingIn
data.comment: Used in the login view as a call to the password forgotten view

data.name: Email
data.comment: Label for emails in the Login, SignUp, Forgot Password and Settings screens

data.name: AlreadyHaveAnAccountQuestionMark
data.comment: Message shown in the sign up view to link to the login page

data.name: GetPasswordResetLink
data.comment: Message shown in the button to get a "reset password link" in forgot password screen

data.name: PasswordResetSuccess
data.value: Link sent. Please, check your email to reset the password.
data.comment: Message that appears when reseting the password works

data.name: PasswordResetExplanation
data.value: Please enter your email to reset your password.
data.comment: Helper text that appears below the email field in the password reset view

data.name: IncorrectEmailOrPassword
data.comment: Error message shown when authentication fails

data.name: GenericLoginError
data.value: Sorry, we’re having trouble logging you in. Please try again.
data.comment: Message shown when exceptions happen during login

data.name: GenericSignUpError
data.value: Sorry, we’re having trouble signing you up. Please try again.
data.comment: Message shown when exceptions happen during sign up

data.name: SelectCountry
data.comment: Placeholder text shown in the sign up view when we are unable to guess the users' country

data.name: EmailIsAlreadyUsedError
data.value: User with this email already exists.
data.comment: Error message shown during sign up when the user tries to create an account with an email that is already in our records

data.name: PasswordResetEmailDoesNotExistError
data.value: Oops! Unknown email. Please check that it's entered correctly.
data.comment: Message shown in the password reset view when the user enters an email not previously registered to Toggl

data.name: PasswordResetOfflineError
data.value: You're offline. Please connect to the internet and try again.
data.comment: Message shown in the password reset view when there are connection issues when trying to reset the password

data.name: PasswordResetGeneralError
data.value: Sorry, we’re having trouble resetting your password. Please try again.
data.comment: Message shown in the password reset view when our servers were not able to reset the password

data.name: TermsOfServiceDialogMessage
data.value: By tapping "I Agree", you understand and agree to Toggl's {0} and {1}
data.comment: This is shown in a popup when the user tries to sign up. {0} is a placeholder for where the words "Terms of Service" will be. {1} is a placeholder for where the words "Privacy Policy" will be.

data.name: CountryOfResidence
data.comment: Shown in the view that allows the user to select their country in the sign up view

data.name: ReviewTheTerms
data.comment: Title of the popup that appears when the user is signing up and has to review our terms of service and privacy policy

data.name: IAgree
data.comment: Used in the popup that prompts users to agree with our terms of service and privacy policy during signup

data.name: Timer
data.comment: Title of main screen bottom bar's tab that leads to the timer/main log view (where you can see the list of time entries)

data.name: Reports
data.comment: Title of reports screen tab in bottom navigation bar. Title used in application shortcuts that lead to the reports screen

data.name: Calendar
data.comment: Title of the calendar view

data.name: Settings
data.comment: Title of the settings tab

data.name: SyncFailed
data.comment: Error message shown when syncing fails. Also used for accessibility to convey the same thing

data.name: SyncFailedOffline
data.comment: Error message shown when syncing fails because of the internet connection. Also used for accessibility to convey the same thing

data.name: SuccessfullySyncedData
data.comment: Message shown by the accessibility assistant to notify the user that syncing has completed

data.name: Offline
data.comment: A short message shown to the user when synchronization fails because the user is not connected to the Internet.

data.name: TapToRetry
data.comment: Message shown when syncing fails to ask the user if he/she wants to try syncing again

data.name: MultipleEntriesDeleted
data.comment: Shown in a snackbar alongside the option of undo-ing an action when the user deletes multiple time entries. The {0} is replaced with a digit

data.name: EntryDeleted
data.comment: Shown in a snackbar alongside the option of undo-ing an action when the user deletes a time entry

data.name: UndoButtonTitle
data.comment: Used in a button that allows the user to undo a recently done action

data.name: LogEmptyStateTitle
data.comment: A message shown to the user on the main screen after he logs into the app.

data.name: LogEmptyStateText
data.value: You haven’t tracked time for a while. Start the timer and your most used time entries will appear here.
data.comment: A message shown to the user on the main screen after he logs into the app.

data.name: CurrentlyRunningTimeEntry
data.comment: Accessibility label used to identify the main log's running time entry

data.name: Project
data.comment: One of the ways you can categorize time entries in Toggl.

data.name: Task
data.comment: Part of the accessibility label used for each item of the suggestions section and each entry in the main log. The accessibility label in the end reads like this: "Suggestion, time entry description, project: project name, task: task name, client: client name, has tags, is billable"

data.name: Client
data.comment: Part of the accessibility label used for each item of the suggestions section and each entry in the main log. The accessibility label in the end reads like this: "Suggestion, time entry description, project: project name, task: task name, client: client name, has tags, is billable"

data.name: YouHaveCreatedYourFirstTimeEntry
data.value: You've created your first time entry
data.comment: Text that appears on an onboarding tooltip when the user creates their first time entry

data.name: TapToEditIt
data.comment: Text of the onboarding tooltip bubble that points to a time entry to indicate that tapping it will open the edit time entry view

data.name: TapToStartTimer
data.comment: Text of the onboarding tooltip bubble that points to the play button to indicate that tapping it will start a time entry

data.name: TapToStopTimer
data.comment: Used in the onboarding bubble to teach users how to stop a time entry by pressing the stop button in the main view

data.name: DoneWithExclamationMark
data.comment: Title of the toast shown when the user successfully contacts us in the send feedback section

data.name: ThankYouForTheFeedback
data.value: Thank you for the feedback. If you had any questions, we’ll get back to you soon.
data.comment: Text that appears in a toast when the user successfully contacts us in the send feedback section

data.name: StartTimeEntry
data.comment: Accessibility label for the button used to start time entries in the main application screen. Also used as the label for application shortcuts that start a new time entry

data.name: StopCurrentlyRunningTimeEntry
data.comment: Accessibility label that describes the action executed when pressing the stop button in the main log

data.name: Continue
data.comment: Used in various places throughout the apps to indicate the action of continuing an existing time entry/timer

data.name: AddDescription
data.comment: Shown as a placeholder when a time entry has no description

data.name: RatingTitle
data.comment: Title of the card that appears in the main log when the user is asked if he is enjoying the app (rating view)

data.name: RatingYes
data.comment: Positive answer to the text of the rating view. The question is "Enjoying Toggl?" from the copy above RatingTitle

data.name: RatingNotReally
data.comment: Negative answer to the text of the rating view. The question is "Enjoying Toggl?" from the copy RatingTitle

data.name: Later
data.comment: Label for the button shown when asking the user to review the apps in the AppStore/PlayStore

data.name: RatingViewPositiveCallToActionTitle
data.comment: Title of the popup that appears when we ask the user if they are liking the app and they say yes

data.name: RatingViewNegativeCallToActionTitle
data.comment: Title of the popup that appears when we ask the user if they are liking the app and they say no

data.name: AndroidStoreName
data.comment: @Invariant

data.name: IosStoreName
data.comment: @Invariant

data.name: RatingViewPositiveCallToActionDescription
data.value: Would you mind rating Toggl in the {0}? Your review really makes a difference.
data.comment: Message that appears in the popup that prompts the user to rate the app in a store. {0} is where the store name will be input

data.name: RatingViewNegativeCallToActionDescription
data.value: Would you mind giving us some feedback? It’ll really help us improve Toggl.
data.comment: Message shown when asking the user to review the apps in the AppStore/PlayStore

data.name: RatingViewPositiveCallToActionButtonTitle
data.comment: Title of card shown when asking the user to review the apps in the AppStore/PlayStore

data.name: RatingViewNegativeCallToActionButtonTitle
data.comment: Message shown in the rating view when the user reports the fact that he/she is not enjoying the Toggl apps

data.name: RatingCallToActionTitle
data.comment: Positive answer to when we ask the user to rate us in the store. It's the answer to the question "Would you mind rating Toggl in the [Store Name}? Your review really makes a difference"

data.name: NoThanks
data.comment: Negative answer to when we ask the user to rate us in the store. It's the answer to the question "Would you mind rating Toggl in the [Store Name}? Your review really makes a difference

data.name: SuggestionsHeader
data.comment: Shown on top of the suggestions

data.name: PullDownToRefresh
data.comment: A short message shown on iOS when the user pulls on the main screen to initiate synchronization.

data.name: ReleaseToRefresh
data.comment: A short message shown on iOS when the user pulls on the main screen and he can release his finger and synchronization will start.

data.name: WorkingOnThis
data.comment: Appears on top of the suggestions (what we predict the user is currently working on) when we only predict a single suggestion

data.name: WorkingOnThese
data.comment: Appears on top of the suggestions (what we predict the user is currently working on) when we only predict multiple suggestions

data.name: TimeEntries
data.comment: Plural of time entry

data.name: TimeEntry
data.comment: Accessibility label used for each item from main log that doesn't have a description, project, task, client

data.name: SuggestionAccessibilityHint
data.comment: Label used to provide some level of accessibility in the suggestions view in the main log. It indicates that clicking/accessing the item stars a time entry

data.name: TimeEntryRowAccessibilityHint
data.comment: Label used to provide some level of accessibility the items in the main log cells. It indicates that clicking/accessing the item leads to the view that edits a time entry

data.name: Suggestion
data.comment: Part of the accessibility label used for each item of the suggestions section in the main log. The accessibility label in the end reads like this: "Suggestion, time entry description, project: project name, task: task name, client: client name"

data.name: TrackedTime
data.comment: Part of the accessibility label used for each item in the main log cells to show the duration of a time entry

data.name: HasTags
data.comment: Part of the accessibility label used for each item in the main log cells to tell if a time entry has tags

data.name: ExpandTimeEntryGroup
data.comment: Accessibility label used to instruct that accessing/clicking on an area expands a time entry group

data.name: CollapseTimeEntryGroup
data.comment: Accessibility label used to instruct that accessing/clicking on an area collapses a time entry group

data.name: IsBillable
data.comment: Part of the accessibility label used for each item in the main log cells to tell if a time entry is billable

data.name: UndoDeletedTimeEntry
data.comment: Message show in a snackbar after deleting a time entry

data.name: Ok
data.comment: Confirmative action for dialogs

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: Title of a button which cancels some operation.

data.name: DifferentWorkspaceAlertTitle
data.value: You've selected a project from another workspace.
data.comment: A message shown in the edit view when changing project of a time entry.

data.name: DifferentWorkspaceAlertMessage
data.comment: A title of a message shown in the edit view when changing project of a time entry.

data.name: CreateProject
data.comment: When the user types the name of a project that does not yet exist, the option to create a project is shown with this text

data.name: CreateTag
data.comment: When the user types the name of a tag that does not yet exist, the option to create a tag is shown with this text

data.name: AddProjectBubbleText
data.value: Add a project and tags on the fly
data.comment: Text that appears inside an onboarding bubble to help the user know that they can create projects and tags using shortcuts

data.name: StartTimeEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Placeholder shown when the user is creating a time entry

data.name: Done
data.comment: Used in several buttons throughout the app to confirm that the user has finished performing a certain action

data.name: ManualTimeEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Placeholder shown when the user is creating a time entry that has already been stopped

data.name: SearchObject
data.comment: This is shown when starting a new time entry. {0} is a placeholder for where the words "Tags" or "Projects" will be.

data.name: NoTagsInfoMessage
data.value: Add keywords to your time entries with # tags.
data.comment: Suggestion given when starting a new time entry that instructs how to use the # character shortcut to add tags

data.name: NoProjectsInfoMessage
data.value: Create a project @ and categorize your tracked time.
data.comment: Suggestion given when starting a new time entry that instructs how to use the @ character shortcut to add projects

data.name: ConfirmDeleteNewTETitle
data.value: Would you like to discard this time entry?
data.comment: A warning shown in the time entry edit view.

data.name: Projects
data.comment: One of the ways you can categorize time entries in Toggl. Plural of project

data.name: TimeEntriesGroupSyncErrorMessage
data.value: {0} out of {1} time entries in this group failed to sync. Open specific time entries for details.
data.comment: Used in the edit time entry view to indicate that some views time entries in a group failed to sync. {0} and {1} will be replaced with digits

data.name: InaccessibleTimeEntryErrorMessage
data.value: This time entry belongs to a workspace that you don't have access to anymore and it can't be synced. Move it to a different workspace by changing the project or delete it.
data.comment: One the error messages shown when a time entry can't be synced

data.name: Save
data.comment: Used in several buttons throughout the app to confirm that changes should be saved

data.name: EditingTimeEntryGroup
data.comment: Shown in the edit view when the user is editing multiple time entries. {0} is replaced with a digit

data.name: DeleteNTimeEntries
data.comment: Action of the button that appears in the edit time entry when editing multiple time entries. {0} is replaced with a digit

data.name: DeleteThisEntry
data.comment: Action of the button that appears in the edit time entry

data.name: Tags
data.comment: One of the ways you can categorize time entries in Toggl. Plutal of tag

data.name: NoTags
data.comment: Shown in the edit view when the users has no tags selected for the time entry being editted

data.name: Edit
data.comment: Label used for buttons/views that lead to the screen to edit time entries

data.name: Billable
data.comment: Used to indicate whether a time entry is marked as billable or not

data.name: Startdate
data.comment: Label used on date pickers to select the starting date of a time entry/timer

data.name: Duration
data.comment: Used in labels to indicate a field is showing the duration of a time entry

data.name: StartTime
data.comment: Used in several places throughout the app to indicate the start time of a time entry

data.name: EndTime
data.comment: Used in labels to indicate the the time a time entry was stopped

data.name: Oops
data.comment: Generic error/alert message title

data.name: AddProjectTask
data.comment: Placeholder text used in the screen to edit time entries when a time entry doesn't have project/task set

data.name: CategorizeYourTimeWithProjects
data.comment: Text used during onboarding of the edit time entry view to suggest the creation/addition of projects to a time entry

data.name: AddTags
data.comment: Used as a placeholder in the edit view when there are no tags selected. Tapping it opens the view to select the tags

data.name: Delete
data.comment: A title of a button which will delete a time entry.

data.name: ConfirmChanges
data.comment: Label for button that save changes when editing time entries

data.name: CategorizeWithProjects
data.value: Categorize your time by adding a project

data.name: EnterProject

data.name: SelectProjectTitle

data.name: EmptyProjectText

data.name: NewProject

data.name: Create

data.name: Workspace

data.name: ProjectName

data.name: AddClient

data.name: PrivateProjectHint
